title: As a User, I want the MNC  error message updated
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC and Club user logs into EBIS
custom_steps: WHEN user Submits MNC with Signing date that falls during the Rule 4 Signing Closed period
custom_expected:
THEN the following error message should fire:
- The message currently reads:
  -- "The Signing date for a Rule 4 player cannot be during the Rule 4 Signing Closed period. Closed Period from [Rule 4 Signing closed period start] to [Rule 4 Draft]"

 - The message should be updated to:
  -- "The Signing date for a Rule 4 player cannot be during the Rule 4 Signing Closed period. Closed Period from [Rule 4 Signing closed period start] to conclusion of the Rule 4 Draft"

Rule 5.12:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit

Error Message 49:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Minor+Contracts+-+Messages

Related to:
https://jira.boc.mlb.com:8443/browse/EBISII-16871

title: As a User I want the contract history to correctly display Add C counts for contract years that have been voided
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
AND viewing Contract History
custom_steps: WHEN a contract year has been voided (contract year flag is 0 and voided flag is 1)
custom_expected:
THEN the contract history should not show a count fa value for any Addendum C's in that year.
AND A player who has had a contract year voided due to an appropriate IL placement will show a blank value for the Count FA column in their contract history

title: As a User I want the contract history to correctly display Add C counts for contract years that have been not yet been earned
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
AND and viewing Contract History
custom_steps: WHEN a contract year has not yet been earned, but is also not voided (contract year flag is zero, voided flag is zero)
custom_expected:
THEN a player who has not yet earned a contract year will show an asterisk next to the actual count in the Count FA column 
in their contract history
AND there will be a footnote at the bottom of the contract history for the asterisk stating that 'The player has not yet earned 
service in the current year, if service is earned this C will count towards free agency'

title: As a User I want the a player whose contract year has been voided to show the 'Contract year voided' message on any addendum C for that year
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a contract year has been voided (contract year flag is zero and voided flag is one)
custom_expected:
THEN any addendum C's the player has in that year should display the contract year voided message
AND a player who has had a contract year voided due to an appropriate IL placement will show the contract year voided message on all addendum C's for that year
AND the voided flag on the actual addendum C will no longer be used to display the message

title: As a User I want the a player whose contract year has been not yet been earned and has not been voided to show a new message on their Addendum C for that year
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a contract year has not yet been earned, but is also not voided (contract year flag is zero, voided flag is zero)
custom_expected:
THEN any addendum C's for the year should show a new message where the 'contract year voided' message appears.  
AND the message should say 
"Player has not yet earned service in contract year.  If service is earned this Addendum C will count towards free agency"

title: As a BOC User, I want to receive an email if a Club attempts to check in an underage player
custom_preconds:
Given BOC and Club user logs into AMT
AND a prospect player doesn't meet the age requirement
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to check in that player
custom_expected:
THEN Club users should be prevented from checking in player who do not meet the age requirement
AND When this error is triggered, AMT will send an Email to BOC Users
AND Text of email to be provided

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities
Related to:
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163433189

title: As a BOC User, I want to receive an email if a Club attempts to check in an Overdue player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club user logs in to AMT
AND a prospect player is Overdue
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to check in that player
custom_expected:
THEN Club users should be prevented from checking in player who is Overdue
AND When this error is triggered, AMT will send an Email to BOC Users
AND Text of email to be provided

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

Related to:
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/163605386

title: As a BOC User, I want to receive an email when a Club submits a Travel Authorization Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club user logs into AMT
custom_steps: WHEN user submits a Travel Authorization form to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN the system should send an email to BOC Users
AND If a Form is in Rejected state, and the Club resubmits the Form to the BOC, the system will send an email to BOC Users
AND Text of email to be provided


Related to:
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161763813

title: As a Club User, I want to receive an email when the status of one of my Club's Travel Authorization Forms is Updated
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs into AMT
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user Approves  submitted Travel Authorization Form
OR BOC user Rejects submitted Travel Authorization Form
custom_expected:
THEN the system should send an email to users of the Club that submitted the Form
AND Text of email to be provided


Related to:
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161764860
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161764887

title: As an AMT User, I want to receive emails if a Checked In player becomes Approaching
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club user log into AMT
custom_steps: WHEN a Checked In player becomes Approaching because he is nearing his checked in day limit
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to users of the Club where he is checked in AND BOC Users
AND These emails will be generated every day until he is checked out
AND Text of email to be provided

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

title: As an AMT User, I want to receive emails if a Checked In player becomes Overdue
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC or Club user logs into AMT
custom_steps: WHEN a Checked In player becomes Overdue because he has reached his checked in day limit
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to users of the Club where he is checked in AND BOC Users
AND These emails will be generated every day until he is checked out
AND Text of email to be provided

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

title: As a Club User, I want to view an Employee Permission Requests widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND the Club User has the ebis-widget-clubeepermissionreq

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=permission_requests_-_club

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Permission+Requests+-+Club
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Permission Requests tab on the Employees Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN on this tab they will see a Permission Requests widget
AND the widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND club users will only see incoming requests where they are selected as the Current Org Contact.
AND they will only see Outgoing requests they created.

title: As a BOC User, I want to view an Employee Permission Requests widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND has the ebis-empc-boc-admin-role permission

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=permission_requests_-_boc

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Permission+Requests+-+BOC
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Permission Requests tab on the Employees Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN On this tab, they will see a Permission Requests widget
AND the widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND the widget will default to show 1 year of requests, rolling over on Opening Day.
AND 2 filters should be available to add via the filter icon:
  -- Requesting Org
  -- Receiving Org

title: Add June 30th Option to As Of Date Prompt on Payroll Comp Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Payroll Comp Report
custom_expected: THEN the As Of Date Prompt will have June 30th as an option

title: As a User, I want a new "DQ?" column added to the Player Information Summary Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Player Information Summary Report
custom_expected:
THEN a new column will be added to the view for the Player Information Summary report
AND this new column will be a flag that indicates whether the player is currently considered a Disqualified Player
AND a new column will be added to Player Information Summary report
AND the column will be titled "DQ?" 
AND possible values are Y and N
AND the column will appear to the right of "Eligible Recall Date"
